page.title: 12SCHOOL PERSONNEL
page.content: Rookhope School has a Headteacher whose teaching load is fifty per cent of the school week. This time is spent mostly with the Junior-aged children, but there is some involvement also with the younger age-range. One full-time and one part-time teacher complete the teaching staff. The School Secretary works three mornings a week on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. A Cleaner-in-Charge is responsible for cleaning and keeping the school tidy. A Senior Meals Attendant and Supervisory Assistant prepare, distribute, look after and tidy up during the lunch hour.
